rows.label: bf07060100_0010
rows.name:
Boss still sleeping?
It two days now.

rows.label: bf07060100_0020
rows.name:
Given the severity of his injuries, 
it's to be expected.

rows.label: bf07060100_0030
rows.name:
Though his life isn't in danger, 
his body needs the rest.

rows.label: bf07060100_0040
rows.name: Wonder if he's going to be okay...

rows.label: bf07060100_0050
rows.name: Rex?!

rows.label: bf07060100_0060
rows.name: What's that?

rows.label: bf07060100_0070
rows.name: I'm leaving.

rows.label: bf07060100_0080
rows.name: But...where will you go?

rows.label: bf07060100_0090
rows.name: I wonder...

rows.label: bf07060100_0095
rows.name: Gramps has gotten small now, so...

rows.label: bf07060100_0100
rows.name: I guess I'll go to Avaritia.

rows.label: bf07060100_0110
rows.name: Rex, you-

rows.label: bf07060100_0120
rows.name: Avaritia? What are you talking about!?

rows.label: bf07060100_0130
rows.name:
What about Homura?
Do you understand the situation we're in?

rows.label: bf07060100_0140
rows.name: Your memory isn't gone or anything, is it?

rows.label: bf07060100_0150
rows.name: My memories are fine.

rows.label: bf07060100_0160
rows.name: Then-

rows.label: bf07060100_0170
rows.name: It's fine.

rows.label: bf07060100_0180
rows.name: Fine? What do you mean...

rows.label: bf07060100_0190
rows.name:
Being called the Driver of Heaven's Holy Grail
got to my head.

rows.label: bf07060100_0200
rows.name: I got arrogant thinking I could do anything.

rows.label: bf07060100_0210
rows.name: But... I couldn't do almost anything.

rows.label: bf07060100_0220
rows.name:
The only thing I managed to do
was hurt Homura...

rows.label: bf07060100_0230
rows.name: So... that's why it's fine now...

rows.label: bf07060100_0240
rows.name:
How can it be fine?!
She got caught to protect you!

rows.label: bf07060100_0250
rows.name: I know!

rows.label: bf07060100_0255
rows.name: But it's impossible.

rows.label: bf07060100_0260
rows.name: Impossible...?

rows.label: bf07060100_0270
rows.name:
I can't possibly win against someone that powerful.
Someone like me can't hope to match them.

rows.label: bf07060100_0280
rows.name: I understand that now.

rows.label: bf07060100_0290
rows.name:
If she stays with them,
Homura won't have to get hurt anymore.

rows.label: bf07060100_0300
rows.name: That's why I'm going back.

rows.label: bf07060100_0310
rows.name: Y-

rows.label: bf07060100_0320
rows.name:
It was impossible from the start...
Eden too... being a Driver too...

rows.label: bf07060100_0330
rows.name: In the end, salvaging is all-

rows.label: bf07060100_0340
rows.name: You id...

rows.label: bf07060100_0342
rows.name: IDIOT!

rows.label: bf07060100_0345
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]ADLIB

rows.label: bf07060100_0350
rows.name: Hurts, yeah?

rows.label: bf07060100_0360
rows.name:
But you know, Homura's pain
is nothing like this.

rows.label: bf07060100_0370
rows.name:
She endured pain many times worse
to go with them.

rows.label: bf07060100_0380
rows.name: To save us.

rows.label: bf07060100_0390
rows.name: I know that already.

rows.label: bf07060100_0400
rows.name: But what am I supposed to do?

rows.label: bf07060100_0405
rows.name: Not a single one of my attacks had any effect.

rows.label: bf07060100_0410
rows.name:
Even the [System:Ruby rt=Device's ]Servant's[/System:Ruby] attacks were deflected...
I couldn't do anything against him, you know?

rows.label: bf07060100_0420
rows.name:
The more I fight,
the more Homura and Hikari get hurt...

rows.label: bf07060100_0430
rows.name: In that case...

rows.label: bf07060100_0432
rows.name: It's better if someone like me isn't by her side...

rows.label: bf07060100_0440
rows.name: [ML:undisp]

rows.label: bf07060100_0450
rows.name: Are you serious?

rows.label: bf07060100_0460
rows.name:
Do you understand how she felt
when she left your side?

rows.label: bf07060100_0470
rows.name:
If I stay by Rex's side, he might
lose many more things...

rows.label: bf07060100_0480
rows.name:
So... it's better if I'm not by Rex's side.
Rex and the world will surely be happier...

rows.label: bf07060100_0490
rows.name: That's what I feel.
